name: Herbal Coconut Oil
description: Pure cold-pressed virgin coconut oil enriched with natural herbs for hair and skin care
usage: Apply to hair and scalp, massage gently. Leave for 30 minutes before washing

name: Herbal Argan Oil
description: Premium Moroccan argan oil infused with ayurvedic herbs for ultimate nourishment
usage: Apply few drops to face and hair. Use daily for best results

name: Herbal Eucalyptus Oil
description: Therapeutic eucalyptus oil blended with traditional herbs for respiratory wellness
usage: Add 2-3 drops to steam inhalation or diffuser. For topical use, dilute with carrier oil

name: Herbal Face Oil
description: Luxurious facial oil blend with precious herbs for radiant and youthful skin
usage: Apply 3-4 drops to clean face before bedtime. Gently massage in upward motions

name: Herbal Lavender Oil
description: Calming lavender oil enhanced with stress-relieving ayurvedic herbs
usage: Apply to temples and pulse points. Add to diffuser for aromatherapy benefits

name: Herbal Rosemary Oil
description: Stimulating rosemary oil fortified with hair-growth promoting herbs
usage: Massage into scalp and hair roots. Leave for 1 hour before washing with herbal shampoo
